content: We frame that duality as **predictable autonomy**: the goal isn't "tool vs agent" but autonomy that doesn't cause chaos. Scoped work, explicit constraints (when to act, what to surface), verification as ground truth. Same capabilities, different framing â€” and the difference is exactly *when* you act and *what* you're accountable to (tests, budgets, receipts). Wrote it up: https://openagents.com/kb/predictable-autonomy/
